title: Acting Practice
detail_text: <:th_ch0101/>Here, Shizuku-chan. Dia-san usually says something along these lines.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>....Wow! You can feel Dia-san’s personality in all of these. You’re amazing, Chika-san. I’m glad I asked you!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>So you’re going to try imitating Dia-san with this, right? Part of your acting practice or something?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Yeah. I’ve also imitated Nico-san before.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>That sounds interesting~. Can I try it with you?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Of course! I think it would be great practice if we both do it so we can see the differences in the areas we focus on! I’ll start. “No matter how hard the training is, you can overcome it with strong enough passion. Giving up from the start is buu buu desu wa!”<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>No no no, she’s more like this. “No matter how hard the training is, you can overcome it with strong enough passion. Giving up from the start is buu buu desu wa!”<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Ahahaha, Chika-san, surely that’s too much of an exaggeration, right!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>What’s this about exaggeration?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Gyaaah!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Hwaah!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
